page.title: 17BENEFITS OF TOURISM
page.content: The advantages of{tourism}locally are that local{businesses}eg shops,cafes, hotels greatly improve their trade as there are more customers. Indeed the cafes and hotels only open in the summer months.Many{school pupils}get {jobs}as waitresses or dishwashers. These{jobs}are only seasonal.However it provides spending money to go to town and buy clothes with, or to put money in the bank. Many of the villagers benifit from the tourism by providing{bed and {breakfast}.This extra income helps to see themselves through the winter.Some local landowners provide{accommodation {for tourists}by building chalets or providing camp sites.The arrival of tourists in summer makes the village very busy leading to queues in the shops and cafes and{congestion} on the roads.
